description.en:
The Atari 400 was announced in 1978 but was not released until the end of 1979.
 
The initial amount of RAM was set at 4kB, which was upped at its introduction to 4k and later even to 16kB.
 
Both the 400 and the 800 were named after secretaries at Atari Inc. Candy was marketed as a game machine or hybrid game console and initially did not have a keyboard.
